hero.subtitle: A special event designed for university students to connect through interest-based matching and meaningful conversations. âœ¨

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Follow these steps to find your perfect connection.

signUp.title: Sign Up & Verify
signUp.description: Create an account using your university email (limited to certain universities) and upload your student ID for verification.

completeProfile.title: Complete Profile
completeProfile.description: Fill out your profile with interests and personality traits to help us find your ideal match.

getMatched.title: Get Matched
getMatched.description: Review potential matches and use our veto system to filter out anyone you're not interested in. We'll then find your final match.

cta.title: Event Inspiration
cta.subtitle:
Contigo is inspired by the "One-Week Couple" event held on university official WeChat accounts in 2024. Although it was just a lighthearted social experiment, it still attracted hundreds of students and genuinely fostered some sincere intimate relationships.
This year, we hope to continue this initiative and make it even better. To achieve this, we've developed an experimental automated matching system. It features an opinionated questionnaire and a "veto card" mechanism, designed to consider your hobbies, personality, and proactive choices, including whether you want it to be a friendship or a romantic relationship. The system is almost fully automated, so this approach also reduces the burden of manual matching, making connections more efficient.
The system's role is to connect you with a peer of opposite gender whose hobbies and personality are a good fit. However, building a relationship requires mutual exploration and effort from both parties. We encourage you to view this as a lighthearted, enjoyable experiment. It could be the beginning of an intimate relationship, or simply an opportunity to meet an interesting new friend. You could go to a lecture together, play a game, go for a night run on the track, or simply grab a coffee and chat. What matters is not what you do, but who you do it with.
Currently, our service supports universities in the Haidian district, including: Tsinghua University and Peking University. Students from other universities who are interested are welcome to contact us via email at <maple@maplewrt.com>. We will consider gradually expanding our service scope based on the requests received.

auth.validEmailError: Please enter a valid university email address
auth.codeSentSuccess: Verification code sent to your email (please check your spam folder)
auth.sendCodeError: Failed to send verification code (often due to rate limiting or backend offline)
auth.tagline:
Supported university emails listed on the homepage. By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Access is only supported from within mainland China.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: All information you provide is securely stored on our backend servers, used solely for matching purposes, not shared with any third parties, and will be permanently deleted within 30 days after the conclusion of the event. If you need to delete your data before the event ends, please send a request to <maple@maplewrt.com>

systemPrivacy.title: Our System Protects Your Privacy
systemPrivacy.description: Your uploaded student ID is only used for manual verification of your student status by administrators and will not be displayed or used by the subsequent matching system. Only the domain section of your email will be shown to other users. Personal life photos will be shared with the other party after the final match is made, and WeChat IDs will only be shared after mutual match confirmation.

qualityConnections.title: Genuine Connections
qualityConnections.description: The event aims to help you establish meaningful connections with verified university students in the area. We encourage you to fill out your profile seriously and participate in the matching process. If the other party happens to be someone you accept and appreciate, you can build a healthy new relationship with them. Due to the limitations of the matching algorithm, the system does not guarantee that your hobbies will be highly matched, and there is even a small probability of significant differences. However, keep in mind that the development of a real relationship does not depend on the system's algorithm but on the mutual effort and exploration of both parties.

idVerification.title: ID Verification
idVerification.uploadDescription: To ensure the authenticity of each participant, please upload your student ID card or equivalent document for verification

verificationPending.title: Verification Pending
verificationPending.description: Your ID is being reviewed by our team. This may take 12-24 hours.

profileForm.title: Profile Form
profileForm.completeDescription: Fill out your profile to help us find your perfect match

confirmed.mutualDescription: You both accepted each other! Now, add them as a friend and start your story. Their WeChat ID is:
confirmed.mutualFooter: Be proactive to keep the story going~ You might start with a simple 'Hi', then talk about things you're both interested in. Enjoy your conversation!
confirmed.waitingDescription: You've accepted the match! Waiting for them to respond.
confirmed.waitingFooter: Check back later for the result :D

profileForm.title: Your Profile
profileForm.subtitle: Interests and personality will be used for matching calculations

selfIntro.label: How would you introduce yourself to a new friend?
selfIntro.placeholder: Present your highlight in two or three sentences

familiarTags.label: Things you like, are familiar with, and would like to do together with them ðŸ¤© (no more than 10 total for both questions)

aspirationalTags.label: Things you want to learn, try, and hope the other person is also interested in ðŸ¤—
aspirationalTags.placeholder: Select interests you want to try...
aspirationalTags.required: Please select interests you want to try

selfTraits.label: Your Personality Traits ðŸ¤” (no more than 3)

idealTraits.label: Ideal partner traits ðŸ¤” (no more than 3)

physicalBoundary.label: If you both find each other nice, what level of relationship do you expect?

recentTopics.label: Topics you've been interested in, thinking about, or discussing recently, or interesting things you've been doing lately (can be from any aspect)
recentTopics.placeholder: For example: what books or movies you've been into, new skills you're learning, or questions you've been pondering...

profilePhoto.label:
Upload a photo of yourself!
(Side, back view, or partial face is fine, as long as you think it does give them an impression of you)

reviewModal.title: Final Review
reviewModal.warning: ! Once submitted, this form cannot be edited. Please review all information carefully.

previews.title: Match Previews
previews.subtitle: Review potential matches and use veto system
previews.infoDescription: These are some potential matches calculated based on your profile. You can use veto cards on candidates you're completely not interested in; vetoed users will not appear in your final match. Excessive vetoes may result in you being unmatched, so please use them wisely. Previews refresh every {{interval}} minutes.
previews.noMatches: No match previews available at this time
previews.familiarTags: They Like and Are Familiar With

vetoConfirm.title: Veto This Match?
vetoConfirm.content: Are you sure you want to veto this candidate? They will be excluded from your final matching.

finalMatch.title: Match Found!
finalMatch.subtitle: Would you like to start a new chapter together?
finalMatch.recentTopics: What they've been interested in lately
finalMatch.familiarTags: They like and are familiar with

acceptConfirm.title: Accept This Match?
acceptConfirm.content: Are you sure you want to accept this match? If both of you accept, you'll be able to exchange contact information.

rejectConfirm.title: Pass on This Match?
rejectConfirm.content: Are you sure you want to pass on this match? This action cannot be undone and you may not get another match.

finalMatch.acceptSuccess: Match accepted! Waiting for their response.
finalMatch.acceptError: Failed to accept match. Please try again.
finalMatch.rejectSuccess: Match passed. We'll find you another opportunity.
finalMatch.rejectError: Failed to pass on match. Please try again.
